# Conducting code review as an author on GitHub

## Prerequisites

- [Have an understanding of why Github is useful](https://hutchdatascience.org/dasl-snack-github)
- [Have a GitHub account](https://hutchdatascience.org/dasl-snack-github)
- [Create a repository on Github](https://hutchdatascience.org/dasl-snack-github)
- [Set up a Git Client](https://hutchdatascience.org/dasl-snack-github)
- Know how to make a pull request - [Beginner method](https://hutchdatascience.org/dasl-snack-github) or [Advanced method](https://hutchdatascience.org/dasl-snack-github)
